channel.title: Non attackable npc? how do i change weapon stance?
channel.description: hi, i have a non attackable npc on my server, and a weapon that i want to be held like a godsword (the new godsword stance,not the old 317 version) how can i change it so it is held like that? and how do i make the npc attackable?

Make it’s hp like 120 in the npcs.cfg

item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

thanks dude! my new weapon holds like a god sword! thanks!
but i still need to know how to make the npc attackable, when you click on it it just walks towards it and does nothing, even though the option is attack

item.source: Non attackable npc? how do i change weapon stance?

item.title: Non attackable npc? how do i change weapon stance?
item.dc:creator: @sageofmali sageofmali
item.description:
@sageofmali wrote:

Well, you’ll have to change the walking stance, running stance, and standing stance. To do this, open up client.java if(id == 746 || id == 667 || id == 35 || id == 2402 || id == 8100) You’ll see under that return 427; that’s the actually Idk what that one is some sort of stabbing? But change those to whatever you want. Now the next one is is the running stance the one I have is 306, that’s the real one I believe. Now, the next is 307 the walking stance, now the next is 301 the standing stance, next search for: [code]if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 35 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 667 ||

playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 2402 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 8100 ||

playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 746)[/code] Under that you will see return (number here) That’s when you’re getting hit, 2063. That’s pretty much it.

Read full topic
